api_list.name: /getip
api_list.description: Retrieve IP of the connected http client
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://skitsanos-getip-v1.p.rapidapi.com/getip"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "skitsanos-getip-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://skitsanos-getip-v1.p.rapidapi.com/getip"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "skitsanos-getip-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())
